detalles: A library for exploratory analysis of Bayesian models with Python. It is currently used in more than 1700 OSS projects and 60 Python libraries.
My \href{https://github.com/arviz-devs/arviz/pull/1284}{\underline{main contribution}} was the implementation from scratch of a more precise and efficient method for estimating density functions.
A high-level interface to construct and fit Bayesian models in \proglang{Python}.
I'm the main contributor in terms of commits and additions since 2020.
An implementation of statistical formulas to specify mixed models in \proglang{Python} in a similar way to the \pkg{lme4} package in \proglang{R}.
It is an alternative to \pkg{Patsy} that we use to specify models in \pkg{Bambi}.
